title: Sound
subtitle: Buy a cassette, CD, or vinyl of your favourite album.
description: A mock e-commerce website selling physical audio formats of popular albums.

title: The Library
subtitle: Search for a book without having to worry about being quiet.
description: A website that uses the Google Books API to retrieve data on a user's search terms.

title: Morse Code Translator
subtitle: Do you know what's 'Hello world!' in Morse code?
description: A simple application that translates English to Morse and vice versa, also offering a text-to-audio feature for English to Morse translations.

title: Scoop
subtitle: Drool over Scoop's menu of artisinal gelato.
description: A website for a mock company Scoop, purely made out of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Simple Weather
subtitle: Check out today's weather to know if you need to bring an umbrella.
description: A basic website that shows the current weather, utilising the user's IP address to obtain their location.

title: BananaOS
subtitle: BananaOS is your pick if you can't choose between the original macOS and Windows 98.
description: A website that lets you play Minesweeper, Connect 4, and offers a basic calculator.
